Description:
The FHIR Code Status sub-resource defines a concept around collected consent for a patient code status. A Code Status sub-resource corresponds to a Code Status (OCS) record in Epic. The Consent.Read returns data about a specific patient code status.

This resource respects patient-level Break-the-Glass checks and advanced directive security checks as configured in Epic. Audit events are logged to the patient audit trail when a code status is accessed by this resource.
SampleResponse:
<Consent xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">

    <id value="eP7KPXxro.hd3w5ZB7AKoIWeB.-PT6NgolqYO9YhEr9o3" />

    <extension url="http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/Comment">

        <valueString value="test" />

    </extension>

    <extension url="http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-TreatmentDirective-Verification">

        <extension url="Verified">

            <valueBoolean value="true" />

        </extension>

        <extension url="VerifiedWith">

            <valueCodeableConcept>

                <coding>

                    <system value="urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" />

                    <code value="116154003" />

                    <display value="PATIENT (PERSON)" />

                </coding>

                <coding>

                    <system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.260.1.7.4.696784.72007" />

                    <code value="1" />

                    <display value="Patient" />

                </coding>

                <text value="PATIENT (PERSON)" />

            </valueCodeableConcept>

        </extension>

        <extension url="VerificationDate">

            <valueDateTime value="2021-09-24" />

        </extension>

    </extension>

    <extension url="http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-TreatmentDirective-Treatment">

        <valueCodeableConcept>

            <coding>

                <system value="urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" />

                <code value="305352006" />

                <display value="ADMISSION TO ADULT INTENSIVE CARE UNIT (PROCEDURE)" />

            </coding>

            <coding>

                <system value="urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" />

                <code value="305351004" />

                <display value="ADMISSION TO INTENSIVE CARE UNIT (PROCEDURE)" />

            </coding>

            <coding>

                <system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.260.1.7.4.696784.72009" />

                <code value="1" />

                <display value="Admission to intensive care unit" />

            </coding>

            <text value="ADMISSION TO ADULT INTENSIVE CARE UNIT (PROCEDURE)" />

        </valueCodeableConcept>

    </extension>

    <modifierExtension>

        <valueCodeableConcept>

            <coding>

                <system value="urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.3.11.60.40.4" />

                <code value="JA" />

                <display value="Ja" />

            </coding>

        </valueCodeableConcept>

        <url value="http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-TreatmentDirective-TreatmentPermitted" />

    </modifierExtension>

    <identifier>

        <use value="usual" />

        <system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.260.1.7.2.798268" />

        <value value="313885" />

    </identifier>

    <status value="active" />

    <category>

        <coding>

            <system value="http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/consentcategorycodes" />

            <code value="acd" />

            <display value="Advance Directive" />

        </coding>

        <coding>

            <system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.260.1.7.4.796783.100" />

            <code value="1" />

            <display value="Full Code" />

        </coding>

        <coding>

            <system value="http://snomed.info/sct" />

            <code value="11291000146105" />

        </coding>

    </category>

    <patient>

        <reference value=" https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/STU3/Consent/eP7KPXxro.hd3w5ZB7AKoIWeB.-PT6NgolqYO9YhEr9o3" />

        <display value="Giles, F.C." />

    </patient>

    <period>

        <start value="2021-09-24T19:28:28Z" />

    </period>

    <dateTime value="2021-09-24T19:28:28Z" />

    <policy>

        <extension url="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/data-absent-reason">

            <valueCode value="unknown" />

        </extension>

    </policy>

</Consent>

Consent.Name: Consent
Consent.Description: An instance of the R4 Consent resource.

category.Name: category
category.Description: The type of code status. Hard-coded to SNOMED code 11291000146105.

comments.Name: extension
comments.Description: Comments entered for the code status.

dateTime.Name: dateTime
dateTime.Description: Date and time that the consent document was created.

except.Name: except
except.Description: This element holds additional rules that can add or remove permissions when returning results. An exception to the base policy of this consent. This element applies to the Netherlands only.

restrictions.Name: extension
restrictions.Description: A free text description of what your restrictions are. This element is only used in Netherlands environments.

type.Name: type
type.Optional: Always returned in the Netherlands only.

identifier.Name: identifier
identifier.Description: ID of the order that recorded the code status.

profile.Name: profile
profile.Description: Available in Netherlands environments only. This element shows that this API conforms to the profile connected to the following canonical url: http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-TreatmentDirective

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: FHIR reference for the Patient the consent applies to.

period.Name: period
period.Description: Time period that this document is valid for. At a minimum, the Consent resource always returns a StartDate and StartTime, which default to the time of the consent document creation. Open-ended periods are represented by the absence of an EndDate and EndTime.

policy.Name: policy
policy.Description: The policy of the consent document.

status.Name: status
status.Description: The state of the code status for a patient. This value follows the specification of the FHIR ConsentState value set.

treatment.Name: extension
treatment.Description: The treatment being consented to, if this is a treatment consent directive. Note that treatment consent directives are specific to organizations in the Netherlands.

TreatmentPermitted.Name: modifierExtension
TreatmentPermitted.Description: Whether a treatment has been consented to, as part of a treatment consent directive. Note that treatment consent directives are specific to organizations in the Netherlands.
TreatmentPermitted.Optional: Always returned in the Netherlands only.

verification.Name: extension
verification.Description: Shows whether this consent has been verified by the patient or their family. Note that treatment consent directives are specific to organizations in the Netherlands.

verificationDate.Name: extension
verificationDate.Description: The date that a patient verified their consent.

verified.Name: extension
verified.Description: Whether or not this consent has been verified. Returns true if either VerifiedWith or VerificationDate elements are answered.

verifiedWith.Name: extension
verifiedWith.Description: A question that verifies a patient’s consent.
